description: Job posting fixtures from generic/custom career pages
html:
Join MegaCorp Industries

Senior Software Engineer - Data Platform

Build scalable data infrastructure

Controls Engineer - Manufacturing

Design PLC and automation systems

Systems Analyst - SAP Integration

Lead ERP integration projects

Data Analyst - Business Intelligence

Create dashboards and reports

Test Automation Engineer

Build CI/CD and automated testing

job_postings.title: Senior Software Engineer - Data Platform
job_postings.description: Build and maintain our data platform infrastructure. Work with big data technologies to process terabytes of manufacturing and supply chain data daily.

job_postings.title: Controls Engineer - Manufacturing
job_postings.description: Design and implement PLC-based control systems for manufacturing automation. Program Allen-Bradley and Siemens PLCs, develop HMI interfaces.

job_postings.title: Systems Analyst - SAP Integration
job_postings.description: Lead SAP integration projects connecting manufacturing systems to ERP. Develop interfaces, manage data flows, and optimize business processes.

job_postings.title: Data Analyst - Business Intelligence
job_postings.description: Create dashboards and reports for manufacturing operations. Analyze production data to identify optimization opportunities and quality improvements.

job_postings.title: Test Automation Engineer
job_postings.description: Build automated testing frameworks and CI/CD pipelines. Implement unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing for our software platforms.
